title: Recapping The Grammy Awards & A Flashback To Fauci | Daily Best of April 4 | Rick & Bubba
description:
We recap the Grammy Awards and can't say we are too familiar with the winners. We flashback to 2004 and Dr. Fauci admitting that natural immunity is the best defense against a virus. Joe Biden calls Jill Biden the Vice President while Kamala Harris thinks it's impossible for rural voters to provide identification. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
